page.title: 02Industry in Witney.
page.content: At one time Witney was devoted to blanket making but now there are a lot of different industries in the town and only one blanket mill.There are 4 industrial estates.They are West End, Witney Industrial Estate,Smiths and Station Road.Also in Crawley there is New Mill and Crawley Mill Estate.Among the factorys in Witney is Bowyers which is a meat firm.Also there is Clarkes the Timber Merchant and there is Memotech which is a computer firm on the Station Road Estate and in Witney Trading Estate there is a car firm called Thoroughbred sports cars.
